title: Stratasys Upgraded; TransUnion, Milacron Initiated
text:
Libor Rigger Gets 14 Years 
10 Ex-UBS (NYSE:UBS) and Citigroup (NYSE:C) trader Tom Hayes was sentenced to 14 years in prison by a British court. A jury found Hayes, 35, guilty of 8 counts of conspiracy to defraud. Prosecutors said he rigged global Libor interest rates and traded interest-rate swaps out of greed. From the ... 08/03/2015 06:36 PM ET Disney Price Target Raised, 3D Systems' Lowered 
Entertainment conglomerate Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) and hard drive maker Seagate Tech (NASDAQ:STX) were among companies receiving price target upgrades Monday. Disney's price target was raised to 130 from 120 by RBC Capital Markets. Shares closed up 0.9% to 121.12 on the stock market today. RBC also ... 08/03/2015 04:42 PM ET Goldman Sachs Has $5.9 Bil Worth Of Disdain For Legal Fees 
Goldman Sachs (NYSE:GS) hiked the upper end of its legal loss provisions to $5.9 billion for 2015 as it negotiates settlements with federal and state officials concerning its sale of mortgage bonds prior to the worldwide financial crisis and Great Recession. Unlike the other big U.S. lenders, ... 08/03/2015 01:19 PM ET AT&T Offers $200 TV, Wireless Bundle After DirecTV Buy 
AT&T (NYSE:T) let loose its first marketing salvo tied to the DirecTV acquisition, announcing a $200 package of TV and wireless services. AT&T will sell the$200 package at its retail stores starting Aug. 10. The $48.5 billion DirecTV deal closed on July 25. With the acquisition, ... 08/03/2015 09:39 AM ET 1% Q2 Profit Growth Is S&P 500's Weakest Since '12 
Just six companies are keeping second-quarter earnings growth in positive territory for S&P 500 businesses, which may suggest more softness to come. With 72% of S&P 500 companies having reported their performance in the last calendar quarter, earnings have grown a mere 0.9%. Revenue so far ... 07/31/2015 05:47 PM ET The Best Frequent Flier Program? Alaska Air, American 
Alaska Airlines (NYSE:ALK) topped the list of best frequent-flier programs, according to a new study published Tuesday. The airline also announced increases in traffic and capacity in July. A new U.S. News & World Report ranked the Seattle-based carrier as the top airline for rewards. The ... 10:45 AM ET Can Monster Keep Energizing The Beverage Sector? 
Monster Beverage (NASDAQ:MNST) might not have the brand recognition of Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) or PepsiCo (NYSE:PEP) among stocks of companies that sell nonalcoholic beverages, but its recent financial performance has been a lot better. While Coke, Pepsi and, to a lesser extent, Dr Pepper Snapple Group ... 08:02 AM ET Community Health Stock Climbs On Q2 And Spinoff Plans 
Community Health Systems (NYSE:CYH) stock climbed more than 7% after hours in the stock market today as the acute care hospital operator reported second quarter profit that sailed past views and announced plans to create a new, publicly traded hospital company by spinning off a group of its ... 08/03/2015 07:27 PM ET Texas Roadhouse Lifts Food Cost View As Beef Soars 
Texas Roadhouse's (NASDAQ:TXRH) earnings missed second-quarter estimates Monday due to higher beef costs, and the steakhouse chain lifted its food inflation outlook for the year. Earnings per share dropped 9% to 30 cents, while Wall Street analysts expected an EPS increase to 37 cents. Revenue rose ... 08/03/2015 06:39 PM ET 
Epam Systems (NYSE:EPAM) might not be the best known stock in its industry group — not when that group includes tech heavyweights IBM (NYSE:IBM), Accenture (NYSE:ACN), Cognizant Technology Solutions (NASDAQ:CTSH) and Infosys (NYSE:INFY) — but the provider of outsourced software ... 08/03/2015 05:02 PM ET
